channel.title: Projects on Vamsi Krishna Vasa
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Vamsi Krishna Vasa

item.title: AWS Elastic Application for facial recognition
item.description: This project leveraged various AWS functionalities such as S3, SQS and EC2 along with Lambda and Docker.

item.title: Implementation of Loop Subdivision Algorithm using Half Edge Data Structure
item.description: Smoothening the Mesh structures leveraging half-edge data structures.

item.title: Modelling and Simulating the Skateboard using DEVS Simulator
item.description: Java based Digital Twin. Completed as a part of Course project in CSE-561 Modelling, Simulation and Theory of applications

item.title: Panaroma Stitching using Python
item.description: This work is completed as a part of Course assignment in 3D Computer Vision at IIT Gandhinagar

item.title: Simulating Fire Evacuation at Hayden library using DEVS Simulator
item.description: Java based Digital Twin for real time Safety evacaution. Completed as a part of Course project in CSE-561 Modelling, Simulation and Theory of applications

item.title: Spherical Conformal Mapping using Python
item.description: Python implementation of paper Genus Zero Surface Conformal Mapping
